sentences.sContent: Get me a sandwich – any kind will do.
sentences.sCn: 给我一份三明治，随便哪种都可以。

synos.tran: 和蔼的；宽容的；令人感激的

words.tran: 亲切的；和蔼的；体贴的；爽快的

trans.tranOther: one of the different types of a person or thing that belong to the same group

trans.tranCn: 和蔼的；宽容的；令人感激的
trans.tranOther: saying or doing things that show that you care about other people and want to help them or make them happy
